Welcome to HamroSchools

Hamroschools is a one-stop website for discovering the best schools and colleges in Nepal, providing valuable information for students, parents, and educators.

Get Started

Our Features

Reviews And Ratings

Read and write reviews about schools in your area. See overall ratings and individual ratings for different aspects of the school (e.g. academics, facilities, teachers)

Discover Schools

Discover schools and colleges based on geography, kind, and ratings. Users can filter schools based on numerous parameters, such as grade levels, extracurricular activities, and so on.

Anonymous Reviews

Leave anonymous reviews or create a profile to connect with other parents and students. Get insights and tips from other users about schools and education.
